data.prayer: Father, encourage the 265,848 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mashonaland Central, Zimbabwe
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Mashonaland Central, Zimbabwe.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Mashonaland Central, Zimbabwe to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Mashonaland Central, Zimbabwe.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Marathi people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Mashonaland Central.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 265,848 believers in the state of Mashonaland Central into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.section_summary:
the state of Mashonaland Central, Zimbabwe has a population of 1,054,100.

We estimate Mashonaland Central has 265,848 people who might know Jesus, 544,002 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 244,250 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Mashonaland Central that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

location.name: Mashonaland Central
location.people_groups_list: Makua, Makhuwa-Meetto, Han Chinese, Mandarin, Lembaa, Gujarati, Tshara-Tshao
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Makua, Makhuwa-Meetto (17,000), Han Chinese, Mandarin (1,500), Lembaa (99,000), Gujarati (30,000), Tshara-Tshao (4,400)
